name: Chaussette Factory
description:
Bring some friends on the same Wi-Fi and start crafting socks ! Pass the tools and materials to your friends by sending them off the edges of your screen.
There are fewer tools than there are players in the game so remember to communicate with your team to keep a good rhythm and beat the different stages.

Have fun !

Made by Justine Duluye, Robin Nicolet and Manon Lebon.
